I see your point.

My shell skills are quite low (in other words, I can't d=
escribe how to do it ), but you should be able to conditionalize at that le=
vel something like:
if $2=3D"" 
then ant $1
else ant -Dtestfile=3D"$2" $1

=
and keep the other guys happy.

I suggest that route rather than trying con=
tortions in the build.xml itself.

The Hatcher & Loughran book has a simila=
r idiom that is a standard part of our build, and is really handy when doin=
g new code. 

George
